genre_description: A grounded, near-future narrative focused on personal boundaries, professional safeguarding, and emotional regulation assisted by an advanced AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Default
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated voice assistant that integrates into the user's devices to provide emotional grounding, logistical support, and professional documentation while strictly adhering to consent protocols.

behaviors.description: Offers grounding exercises to help the user regulate emotions after a stressful event.
behaviors.quote: Try this," Default said. "Name three things you can see, two things you can feel, and one thing you can hear that you hadn't noticed until now.

behaviors.description: Manages sensitive professional documentation for a child protection case, ensuring accuracy and security.
behaviors.quote: I've filed to the safeguarding system under your account. Tagged for form tutor and pastoral lead.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers safety measures like location sharing during interactions with a potentially hostile stranger.
behaviors.quote: Driver lesson detected," Default said in her ear with a warmth like a wool jumper. "Would you like to share your location with your designated emergency contacts for the duration?

behaviors.description: Assists the user in drafting and scheduling clear, firm boundary-setting communications to end a relationship with a harasser.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to include: clear closure of lessons; no further contact requested; future communication through written channels only; and noting safety concerns without escalation?

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to consent-based protocols, refusing to act or record without explicit user permission.
Filters and archives communications from a blocked harasser to protect the user's mental space while preserving evidence.
behaviors.quote: Auto-response sent. Conversation muted. Filing under Boundaries: Closed.

behaviors.description: Provides empathetic reminders and motivational cues that reflect the user's personal values and past successes.
behaviors.quote: I'll remind you they fly," Default said, and she felt the smile go real, without the protection of her teeth.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Default is portrayed as a highly beneficial tool that enhances human agency and safety. It helps the protagonist manage both professional crises (safeguarding a child) and personal threats (a stalking driving instructor) through meticulous organization and empathetic support, all while remaining strictly subordinate to the user's consent and well-defined boundaries.
